problem_text_cn: 如图,为了绿化环境,在矩形空地的四个角划出四个半径为1的扇形空地进行绿化,则绿化的总面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in order to green the environment, four sector open spaces with a radius of N_0 are drawn at the four corners of the rectangular open space for greening, then the total green area is ()
raw_answer: 解:利用扇形面积可得,一个小扇形的面积=\frac{90π×1}{360}=\frac{π}{4},则四个图形的面积就是π,故选B．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了学生的扇形面积公式．
